channel.title: blog-setup on Wong Chun Sing
channel.description: Recent content in blog-setup on Wong Chun Sing

item.title: Testing blog post upload from Netlify CMS
item.description: Implementing Netlify CMS is as easy as adding two files, i.e. config.yaml and index.html to the /admin folder in the /static folder. However, some of my posts where not properly displayed and I do not know if this post will go to the correct place, i.e. /content/posts or not. I guess we will find out in the next post. Problems now: Feature image is required weight is required.
